Uses of Interface
net.objectzoo.delegates.Action2

  • Packages that use Action2 
    Package Description
    net.objectzoo.delegates
    This package contains the delegates of the Events4J API.
    net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters  
    net.objectzoo.delegates.impl  
    net.objectzoo.events.impl
    This package contains support classes that implement EventDelegates ready to be used.

    • Uses of Action2 in net.objectzoo.delegates

      Methods in net.objectzoo.delegates that return Action2 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T1,T2> Action2<T1,T2> Action2.from(BiConsumer<T1,T2> consumer)
      Converts the given BiConsumer into an Action2 that invokes the consumer.
      static <T1,T2> Action2<T1,T2> Action2.from(BiFunction<T1,T2,?> function)
      Converts the given BiFunction into an Action2 that invokes the function and then ignores its return value.
      default Action2<T1,T2> Function2.toAction()
      Converts this Function2 into an Action2 ignoring the function's return value.

    • Uses of Action2 in net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters

      Classes in net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters that implement Action2 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Action2ToAsyncAction2<T1,T2>
      An adapter that converts an Action2 or BiConsumer to a new Action2, that makes an asynchronous calls to the original Action0 upon invocation.

    • Uses of Action2 in net.objectzoo.delegates.impl

      Classes in net.objectzoo.delegates.impl that implement Action2 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Action2AsyncSupport<T1,T2>
      This is an abstract support class that can be used to quickly implement asynchronous actions.

    • Uses of Action2 in net.objectzoo.events.impl

      Subinterfaces of Action2 in net.objectzoo.events.impl 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Event2AsyncDelegate<T1,T2>
      An Event2AsyncDelegate implements Action2Async as well as Event2Delegate and is meant as a specification for implementations that delegate calls to the Action2Async interface asynchronously to all subscribers of the Event2Delegate interface.
      interface  Event2Delegate<T1,T2>
      An Event2Delegate implements Action2 as well as Event2 and is meant as a specification for implementations that delegate calls to the Action2 interface to all subscribers of the Event2 interface.
      Classes in net.objectzoo.events.impl that implement Action2 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Event2AsyncAdapter<T1,T2>
      The Event2AsyncAdapter is class that adapts an Event2Delegate to Event2AsyncDelegate so that the original delegates subscribers can be invoked asynchronously.
      class  Event2Caller<T1,T2>
      The Event2Caller is a Event2Delegate implementation that allows event distribution to a single subscriber.
      class  Event2Distributor<T1,T2>
      The Event2Distributor is a Event2Delegate implementation allows that event distribution to multiple subscribers.
